title: Infiniti Pro by Conair 3-in-1 Hair Styler
description: Top technology and attachments that lock securely into place make this Infiniti by Conair 1875W hot-air styler perfect for all of today's hottest looks.  The swivel cord never gets in the way.  Salon results without the Salon from Infiniti by Conair.
